topics.body:
So I haven't gotten a response from my brother yet; there's three possibilites:
1)He's beyond furious.
2)He's crying cause the shit I called him out for he does feel like shit for but the way he deals with it is blaming other people and now that he knows how he's actually been acting he's realized how bad of a person he is.
3)A combination of the two.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
